name: Car insurance
shortDescription: Enjoy the freedom your wheels give you.
salesHighlights: We cover all kinds of vehicles, for example cars, trucks, vans, SUVs, 4x4s, motorcycles, boats, caravans, trailers, small watercraft and more.
You can choose from different solutions, ranging from comprehensive cover to third-party cover only.
We offer various car hire options to suit your needs and your pocket.
You can get extras like tyre-and-rim cover and extended warranties.
Home and roadside assistance services are available.
We also provide 4x4 off-road cover and cover for classis cars, which is quite hard to find
It is quick and easy to apply.
